hero.subtitle: I specialize in creating innovative solutions designed to streamline processes, drive digital transformation, and enhance the customer experience.

kirmize.subtitle: A mobil web application for the digitalization of planning appointments.

portfolio.subtitle: My personal portfolio website to showcase my work.
portfolio.goal: The goal of creating my own portfolio was to highlight my previous projects and experiences in order to showcase my skills and expertise. Additionally, it served as practice to improve skills such as design and animation. Lastly, a portfolio enhances online presence and facilitates contact with potential employers or clients.
portfolio.implementation: First, I researched what features make a good portfolio and gathered inspiration. Then, I planned the structure of my website and created a concept. Subsequently, the portfolio was implemented using React, ChakraUI, and Framer Motion. Deployment is done via GitHub Pages.

multimediaDB.subtitle: A prototypical software using multimedia database for the digitalization of veterinary practices (Case Study).

eaFlowShop.subtitle: An evolutionary algorithm for the optimization of flow shop scheduling problems.

weatherData.subtitle: A web application for the visualization of weather data based on XML files.
